author: Simon Difford
description: The green fairy, tamed with honey and spiced with ginger.
name: New Year's Absolution
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: STIR honey with absinthe in base of shaker until honey dissolves
Add apple juice, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with ginger ale and stir
